title: Battle of Antietam: Sunken Road - North & South: American Civil War Mod Gameplay
description:
Welcome to part 2 of the Antietam battle series.  It's about 9am and the center line are about to clash.  THe CSA holds Sunken Road and the Union will attack with wave after wave!  Enjoy the battle :D

North & South: American Civil War is a mod for Napoleon Total War

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
